name: Crafted_Coercive_Persuasion_C
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, the confuse duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
